Html:
I have a small ubuntu webserver installed on an old pc.

Trying some sample code on my homeserver doesn't give any problems. On my host, conditions (php 5.2, ...) are ok, I get a "500 internal server" on this line: $objWriter->save( 'php://output' ); or "File not found" ... ?!?
Transfering the map to 0777 doesn't help .... ?!

What am I doing wrong ??

Hmm... Have not experienced this before. Is this happening only with php://output or also when you save to disk? Can you try to do some further debugging by putting in an exit; statement in the save method starting from top and moving it down until you find out which line in the save method is causing the problem.
No sorry, I was too fast, gzip is not enabled ...
